page.title: 12 LAW AND ORDER.
page.content: In Broadwindsor there Isn't a police station but there is in Beaminster. The police come to the school once a year or so , The school we go to called Broadwindsor primary school. some times pc Dawson who is a police man who works in Beaminster some times comes round to show us slides of wot to do and wot not to do.There are places called courts where people go if they break the law or if they kill some one. In a court thir is a person who decides if the prisoner is guilty then he or she is put behind bars for a while and if they are'nt gilty they are let free.
